name: @passport-next/eslint-config-passport-next
description: Passport Next eslint config common to all repos forked from https://github.com/brettz9/eslint-config-ash-nazg

scripts.unused:array-func: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-array-func all
scripts.unused:compat: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-compat recommended
scripts.unused:eslint-comments: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-eslint-comments recommended
scripts.unused:import: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-import recommended eslint-config-standard
scripts.unused:jsdoc: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-jsdoc recommended
scripts.unused:no-use-extend-native: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-no-use-extend-native recommended
scripts.unused:node: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-node recommended-module
scripts.unused:promise: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-promise recommended eslint-config-standard
scripts.unused:radar: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-radar recommended
scripts.unused:unicorn: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-unicorn recommended
scripts.unused:no-unsanitized: node -r esm inherited-rules/build unused eslint-plugin-no-unsanitized DOM
scripts.unused: rimraf inherited-rules/unused/*.js & npm run unused:@brettz9 && npm run unused:array-func && npm run unused:compat && npm run unused:eslint-comments && npm run unused:html && npm run unused:import && npm run unused:jsdoc && npm run unused:markdown && npm run unused:no-use-extend-native && npm run unused:node && npm run unused:promise && npm run unused:radar && npm run unused:unicorn && npm run unused:no-unsanitized && npm run unused:eslint
scripts.inherited:array-func: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-array-func all
scripts.inherited:compat: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-compat recommended
scripts.inherited:eslint-comments: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-eslint-comments recommended
scripts.inherited:import: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-import recommended
scripts.inherited:jsdoc: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-jsdoc recommended
scripts.inherited:no-use-extend-native: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-no-use-extend-native recommended
scripts.inherited:node: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-node recommended-module
scripts.inherited:promise: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-promise recommended
scripts.inherited:radar: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-radar recommended
scripts.inherited:unicorn: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-unicorn recommended
scripts.inherited:no-unsanitized: node -r esm inherited-rules/build inherited eslint-plugin-no-unsanitized DOM
scripts.inherited: rimraf inherited-rules/implicitly-included/*.js && npm run inherited:array-func && npm run inherited:compat && npm run inherited:eslint-comments && npm run inherited:html && npm run inherited:import && npm run inherited:jsdoc && npm run inherited:markdown && npm run inherited:no-use-extend-native && npm run inherited:node && npm run inherited:promise && npm run inherited:radar && npm run inherited:standard && npm run inherited:unicorn && npm run inherited:eslint-recommended && npm run inherited:eslint && npm run inherited:@brettz9 && npm run inherited:no-unsanitized
scripts.compare: npm run inherited && npm run unused

author: Brett Zamir
